DKA.Title: 性命雙修萬神圭旨亨集; Xingming shuangxiu wanshen guizhi heng ji

div.h4:
性命雙修萬神圭旨亨集
Xingming shuangxiu wanshen guizhi heng ji
div.p:
Beskrivelse
Daoistisk work from the late Ming Dynasty e.g. 1622. This manuscript has been copied in Korea in the 18th century, possibly from a Chinese printed edition. It includes 11 illustrations in typical line drawing style. Daoist alchemy and sexual hygiene Kaishu
